backend/main.mo: Defines an e-commerce backend canister with authorization, product management, user profiles, and order handling using Maps for storage.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, and test IDs for the project’s product, cart, checkout, and order functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend files describing their responsibilities and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining global theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that loads the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, global layout, auth-guarded routes, and admin pages for the frontend.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: Implements React cart state with add, update, remove, totals, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/cart/cartStorage.ts: Provides load/save/clear cart helpers with BigInt-safe serialization to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/Auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper that restricts content to admins, showing a loader or access denied message.
frontend/src/components/Auth/RequireAuth: Enforces authentication, displaying a login prompt when no identity is present.
frontend/src/components/CartLineItem.tsx: Displays a cart item with image, price, quantity controls, and remove option.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with links, cart icon, login, and mobile menu; adds admin link if applicable.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product display card linking to product details, showing image, price, and availability.
frontend/src/components/QuantityPicker.t: Numeric quantity selector with increment/decrement buttons and input validation.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Search input with icon for filtering products by text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Mutations for creating, updating, and toggling availability of products, invalidating product queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Query and mutation hooks for products, search, orders, and customer order retrieval using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile using react-query and an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Defines hooks to get the caller’s user role and admin status through actor-based react-query calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark mode CSS variables for theme colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductEdi: Provides a form to create or edit products, loading existing data when editing and submitting changes through admin API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Shows an admin product list with controls to add, edit, and toggle availability, including loading skeletons and status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items, allows quantity updates and item removal, and provides a checkout summary.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the checkout form, creates an order on submit, and redirects to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Fetches and lists the user’s past orders with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows confirmation details for a placed order, including item breakdown and totals.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific order, including items, totals, and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays individual product details, handles loading and not-found states, and allows adding available products to the cart with quantity selection.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all available products with search filtering, showing skeletons while loading and a hero banner at the top.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current e-commerce build state, listing implemented features, image requirements, and metadata. Includes versioning and a partially shown new feature request list.
